transcript: Sam from Canada Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu How is everything Sheikh? Alhamdulillah My question Sheikh is if I am behind an imam and he's in sujood and his awrah is exposed and I'm behind him, I'm the follower, should I depart from that salat or should I still continue and would the salat be valid in this case even though the imam is in the end his thing is exposed his back when he prostrates?
